        lookup
      • lookup(data: LinkerData; s: PSym): LinkIndex
      • lookup(patterns: seq[IdentPattern]; s: PSym): int
  Source   Edit

Implements types and procedures related to mapping symbols to their in-VM IDs.

Imports

../ast/ast_types, ../ast/ast, ../ast/idents

Types

IdentPattern = distinct string
A matcher pattern for a fully qualified symbol identifier   Source   Edit 
LinkerData = object
  symToIndexTbl*: Table[int, LinkIndex] ## the link table. Keeps track of all symbols known to the linker
  callbackKeys*: seq[IdentPattern] ## the matcher patterns used for implementing overrides
All data required for mapping symbols to the entities they represent inside the VM (procedures, globals, constants).   Source   Edit 
LinkIndex = uint32
Identifies a linker-relevant entity. There are three namespaces, one for procedures, one for globals, and one for constants -- which namespace an index is part of is stored separately.   Source   Edit

Procs

func lookup(data: LinkerData; s: PSym): LinkIndex {.inline, ...raises: [KeyError],
    tags: [].}
Returns the link-index for the symbol s, which must exist in the link table.   Source   Edit 
func lookup(patterns: seq[IdentPattern]; s: PSym): int {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Tries to find and return the index of the pattern matching s. If none is found, -1 is returned   Source   Edit
